extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey

recipes.title: Strawberry Pie a la Mode for Two

winePairing.pairingText: Lambrusco Dolce, Late Harvest Riesling, and Vin Santo are my top picks for Pie. These wines are all sweet, which is important since wine should usually be sweeter than the food you're pairing with it. The Chateau Chantal Late Harvest Riesling with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 21 dollars per bottle.

recipes.instructions: Optional: Make Three Ingredient Vanilla Coconut Ice Cream (allow at least 5 hours to make).Preheat oven to 325 and lightly grease one 46 (or similar size) dish or two ramekins with coconut oil.In a small bowl, combine all crust ingredients.Press mixture into the bottom of the dish, pushing all the way up against the sides to evenly form the crust.Bake for 10 minutes.While crust is baking, make filling by processing strawberries in a food processor until almost completely broken down.Place strawberries and honey in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until simmering.Remove filling from heat and stir in gelatin.Once the crust is done baking, remove from oven and press the bottom down with the back of a  spoon.Pour in filling (top with additional sliced strawberries if desired).Bake for additional 10-12 minutes.Remove from oven, allow to cool, and top with ice cream. Enjoy!

steps.step: Optional: Make Three Ingredient Vanilla Coconut Ice Cream (allow at least 5 hours to make).Preheat oven to 325 and lightly grease one 46 (or similar size) dish or two ramekins with coconut oil.In a small bowl, combine all crust ingredients.Press mixture into the bottom of the dish, pushing all the way up against the sides to evenly form the crust.
Bake for 10 minutes.While crust is baking, make filling by processing strawberries in a food processor until almost completely broken down.
Place strawberries and honey in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until simmering.
Remove filling from heat and stir in gelatin.Once the crust is done baking, remove from oven and press the bottom down with the back of a  spoon.
Pour in filling (top with additional sliced strawberries if desired).
Remove from oven, allow to cool, and top with ice cream. Enjoy!
